00031 namespace thrust

00033 
00038 template<typename T> class device_allocator;
00039 
00046 template<>
00047   class device_allocator<void>
00048 {
00049   public:
00050     typedef void                              value_type;
00051     typedef device_ptr<void>                  pointer;
00052     typedef device_ptr<const void>            const_pointer;
00053     typedef std::size_t                       size_type;
00054     typedef pointer::difference_type difference_type;
00055 
00056     // convert a device_allocator<void> to device_allocator<U>
00057     template<typename U>
00058       struct rebind
00059     {
00060       typedef device_allocator<U> other;
00061     }; // end rebind
00062 }; // end device_allocator<void>
00063 
00071 template<typename T>
00072   class device_allocator
00073     : public device_new_allocator<T>
00074 {
00075   public:
00076     // convert a device_allocator<T> to device_allocator<U>
00077     template<typename U>
00078       struct rebind
00079     {
00080       typedef device_allocator<U> other;
00081     }; // end rebind
00082 
00083     __host__ __device__
00084     inline device_allocator() {}
00085 
00086     __host__ __device__
00087     inline device_allocator(device_allocator const&) {}
00088 
00089     template<typename U>
00090     __host__ __device__
00091     inline device_allocator(device_allocator<U> const&) {}
00092 }; // end device_allocator
